name: Math Questions: a Remake of PowerPoint Game
name_original: Math Questions: a Remake of PowerPoint Game
description:
Math Questions: a Remake of PowerPoint Game is a small game that was made from PowerPoint to TyranoBuilder where you answer 10 easy and hard math questions.

Try answer all 10 math questions. If any of the question is wrong, you have to restart from the beginning.

Good luck.
